generated_text:
- sidewalk: The image shows a paved pedestrian walkway with metal bollards, flanked by outdoor seating areas and trees, which is characteristic of a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the background and along the sides of the sidewalk, including a modern glass-fronted structure and traditional brick buildings.
- vegetation: Numerous trees are present along the sidewalk and in the background, indicating significant vegetation.
- person: Several individuals are visible sitting at outdoor tables, standing, or walking along the sidewalk.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the right side of the sidewalk, partially visible in the foreground.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the right side of the sidewalk, next to the motorcycle.
- pole: Numerous vertical metal poles (bollards) are installed along both sides of the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: A blue and white "U" sign (indicating a U-Bahn station) is visible in the distance on the right side of the sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast or cloudy.
- terrain: There is a small patch of grass visible in the background on the right side, behind the parked bicycles.
